verses.verse: Jude <S%G2455><s%>, a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James<s%>, to them that are <S%G2822>called<s%>, <S%G37>beloved<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>kept<s%> for <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:
Mercy <S%G1656><s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied<s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, while I was <S%G4160>giving<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4710>diligence<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> our <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%>, <S%G2192>I<s%> <S%G2192>was<s%> <S%G318>constrained<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3870>exhorting<s%> you to <S%G1864>contend<s%> earnestly for the <S%G4102>faith<s%> which <S%G3860>was<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> for all <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto the <S%G40>saints<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there <S%G3921>are<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> crept in <S%G3921>privily<s%>, even they who <S%G4270>were<s%> of <S%G3819>old<s%> <S%G4270>written<s%> of beforehand <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation<s%>, ungodly <S%G765>men<s%>, <S%G3346>turning<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2316>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G720>denying<s%> <S%G2316>our<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> Master1203, 2316 and2532, 2257 <S%G1203>Lord<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

Now I <S%G1014>desire<s%> <S%G1161>to<s%> <S%G5279>put<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> in <S%G5279>remembrance<s%>, <S%G1492>though<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> all <S%G5124>things<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> for <S%G3754>all<s%>, that the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, having <S%G4982>saved<s%> a <S%G2992>people<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt<s%>, <S%G1208>afterward<s%> <S%G622>destroyed<s%> them that <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> that <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> own <S%G746>principality<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G620>left<s%> their <S%G2398>proper<s%> <S%G3613>habitation<s%>, he hath <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G1199>in<s%> <S%G126>everlasting<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G2217>darkness<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2920>judgment<s%> of <S%G2250>the<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>.

Even <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1116>Gomorrah<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, having <S%G5158>in<s%> like3664, 5125 <S%G5158>manner<s%> with these given themselves over to <S%G1608>fornication<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G565>gone<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G2087>strange<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, are set <S%G4295>forth<s%> as an <S%G1164>example<s%>, <S%G5254>suffering<s%> the <S%G1349>punishment<s%> <S%G4442>of<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>.

Yet in <S%G3668>like<s%> manner <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in their <S%G1797>dreamings<s%> <S%G3392>defile<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> set at nought <S%G2963>dominion<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G987>rail<s%> at <S%G1161>dignities<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3413>Michael<s%> the <S%G743>archangel<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G1252>contending<s%> with the <S%G1228>devil<s%> he <S%G1256>disputed<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%>, <S%G5111>durst<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> bring against <S%G2018>him<s%> <S%G2920>a<s%> <S%G988>railing<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>.

But <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G987>rail<s%> at <S%G3745>whatsoever<s%> things they <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3745>what<s%> they <S%G1987>understand<s%> <S%G5447>naturally<s%>, <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G2226>creatures<s%> without <S%G249>reason<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> these <S%G5125>things<s%> are they <S%G1161>destroyed<s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>! <S%G3754>For<s%> they <S%G4198>went<s%> in the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2535>Cain<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> ran <S%G1632>riotously<s%> in the <S%G4106>error<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam<s%> for <S%G3408>hire<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G622>perished<s%> in the <S%G485>gainsaying<s%> of <S%G2879>Korah<s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> they who are hidden <S%G4694>rocks<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G26>love-feasts<s%> when they feast <S%G4910>with<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, shepherds that without <S%G870>fear<s%> <S%G4165>feed<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>; <S%G3507>clouds<s%> without <S%G504>water<s%>, carried <S%G4064>along<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G417>winds<s%>; <S%G5352>autumn<s%> <S%G1186>leaves<s%> without <S%G175>fruit<s%>, <S%G1364>twice<s%> <S%G599>dead<s%>, plucked up by the <S%G1610>roots<s%>;

Wild <S%G66><s%> <S%G2949>waves<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, foaming <S%G1890>out<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G152>shame<s%>; <S%G4107>wandering<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%>, for <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2217>blackness<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%> hath been <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G5125>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1802>Enoch<s%>, the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G76>Adam<s%>, <S%G4395>prophesied<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> ten <S%G3461>thousands<s%> <S%G40>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> holy <S%G40>ones<s%>,

to <S%G4160>execute<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> <S%G2596>upon<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1827>convict<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have ungodly <S%G764>wrought<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4642>hard<s%> things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1113>murmurers<s%>, <S%G3202>complainers<s%>, <S%G4198>walking<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G1939>lusts<s%> <S%G2532>(and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> great <S%G5246>swelling<s%> <S%G2296>words<s%>), showing <S%G2296>respect<s%> <S%G5484>of<s%> <S%G4383>persons<s%> for the sake <S%G5484>of<s%> <S%G5622>advantage<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>, <S%G27>beloved<s%>, <S%G3415>remember<s%> ye the <S%G4487>words<s%> which have been spoken <S%G4280>before<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

That <S%G3754><s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G5550>the<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> there shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1703>mockers<s%>, <S%G4198>walking<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G763>ungodly<s%> <S%G3754>lusts<s%>.
These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> they <S%G1438>who<s%> make <S%G592>separations<s%>, <S%G5591>sensual<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>, <S%G27>beloved<s%>, building <S%G2026>up<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G4102>on<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> most <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>,

keep <S%G5083><s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, looking <S%G4327>for<s%> the <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G3739>some<s%> have <S%G1653>mercy<s%>, who are in <S%G3303>doubt<s%>;

and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%>, <S%G726>snatching<s%> them out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4442>fire<s%>; and on some have mercy <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%>; <S%G3404>hating<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G5509>garment<s%> <S%G4695>spotted<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> unto him that is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5442>guard<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> from <S%G679>stumbling<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2476>set<s%> you before the <S%G2714>presence<s%> <S%G1391>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> without <S%G299>blemish<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> exceeding <S%G20>joy<s%>,

to <S%G2316>the<s%> only3441, 4680 <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Saviour<s%>, through Jesus Christ <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1391>Lord<s%>, be glory, <S%G3172>majesty<s%>, <S%G2904>dominion<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%>, before all <S%G2532>time<s%>, and <S%G3568>now<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> for <S%G3956>evermore<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.
